main event: A UFO sighting report documents the observation of a white object in the sky on May 5, 1964, over the Pacific Ocean.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes, with the object being observed for 105 seconds,The object was described as the size of a first magnitude star,The object was reported to travel at a very high altitude,The course of the object connected the stars Dubhe and Polaris,The observer confirmed the object's description matched that of the ECHO I satellite.
sighted object: a white object in the sky
